alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued January 30 at 2:28AM EST until January 31 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 8 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30. For the Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 36 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Inland Palm Beach, Inland Collier and Inland Broward Counties. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, until 9 AM EST this morning. For the Frost Advisory, from 3 AM to 8 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Palm Beach County
